content: Present a list of top five stargazing locations around the world in CSV format: Location, Country, Best Time to Visit.

Here's a list of top five stargazing locations around the world in CSV format: Location, Country, Best Time to Visit.

Mauna Kea, United States, December to February

Atacama Desert, Chile, May to September

La Palma, Spain, March to May

Sossusvlei, Namibia, June to August

Aoraki/Mount Cook, New Zealand, March to May
